attributes.action: involve the RCM in guidelines on maternity rights more pro - actively and legislate so every Human resource dept as employers is aware, knows and practices what EU legislation states - not only the gvt. but any organisation where women work DO have a vicarious liabilty to follow these procedures) and if they aren't enough - then new Europe - wide laws need to be re - defined
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
